extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Cisco Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the Cisco device is running a vulnerable release of Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) Software or Cisco Firepower Threat Defence (FTD) software.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device running a vulnerable release?
Are software updates available from Cisco?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Cisco Software Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Cisco device with the latest software updates provided by Cisco to address the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Dynamic Access Policy (DAP)
extracted_playbook.description: Terminate VPN tunnel establishment when the 'DefaultADMINGroup' or 'DefaultL2LGroup' connection profile/tunnel group is used.

extracted_playbook.title: Deny Remote Access VPN Using Default Group Policy
extracted_playbook.description: Deny remote access VPN using the default group policy ('DfltGrpPolicy').

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Users in the LOCAL User Database
extracted_playbook.description: Lock users to a specific connection profile/tunnel group only to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Prevent Remote Access VPN Sessions
extracted_playbook.description: Prevent users from establishing remote access VPN sessions to mitigate unauthorized access risks.
